original: Bhadracaryādeśanā I yāvata keci daśad-diśi loke sarva-triyadhva-gatā nara-siṁhāḥ tān ahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ |

original: (1) II kṣetra-rajopana-kāya-pramāṇaiḥ sarva-jināna karomi praṇāmam sarva-jinābhimukhena manena bhadra-carī-praṇidhāna-balena |
analyzed: iii kṣetra raja upana kāya pramāṇaiḥ karomi praṇāmam sarva jina abhimukhena bhadracarī praṇidhāna balena

original: III eka-rajāgri rajopama-buddhā buddha-sutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye evam aśeṣata dharmata-dhātuṁ sarvādhimucyami pūrṇa jinebhiḥ |
analyzed: madhye

original: (2) IV teṣu ca akṣaya-varṇa-samudrān sarva-svarāṅga-samudra-rutebhiḥ sarva-jināna guṇān bhaṇamānas tān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān |
analyzed: iv teṣu ca akṣaya varṇa samudrān sarva svara aṅga samudra rutebhiḥ guṇān bhaṇamānaḥ tān sugatān stavamī sarvān

original: V puṣpa-varebhi ca mālya-varebhir vādya-vilepana-chatra-varebhiḥ (3)

analyzed: ca dhūpa varebhiḥ pūjana teṣu karomi

original: VI vastra-varebhi ca gandha-varebhiś cūrṇa-puṭebhi ca meru-samebhiḥ sarva-viśiṣṭa-viyūha-varebhiḥ pūjana teṣu jināna karomi |
analyzed: vi vastra varebhi ca gandha varebhiḥ cūrṇa puṭebhiḥ ca meru samebhiḥ sarva viśiṣṭa viyūha varebhiḥ teṣu karomi

original: VII yā ca anuttara pūja udārā tān adhimucyami sarva-jinānām bhadra-carī-adhimukti-balena vandami pūjayamī jina sarvān |
analyzed: yā ca anuttara pūja udārā tān sarva jinānām bhadracarī adhimukti balena vandami pūjayamī jina sarvān

original: (4) VIII yac ca kṛtaṁ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu moha-vaśena kāyatu vāca manena tathaiva taṁ pratideśayamī ahu sarvam |
analyzed: yat ca kṛta mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu moha vaśena tathā eva sarvam

original: IX yac ca daśad-diśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa-aśaikṣa-pratyekajinānām buddha-sutān' atha sarva-jinānāṁ taṁ anumodayamī ahu sarvam |
analyzed: yat ca daśat diśi śaikṣa aśaikṣa pratyeka jinānām buddha sutān atha sarva jinānām te sarvam

original: (5) X ye ca daśad-diśi loka-pradīpā bodhi vibudhya asaṅgata prāptāḥ tān ahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthāṁś cakru anuttaru varttanatāyai |
analyzed: ye ca daśat diśi loka pradīpāḥ vibudhya prāptāḥ tān sarvi adhyeṣami nāthāḥ cakru anuttaru vartana tāyai

original: XI ye'pi ca nirvṛti darśitu-kāmās tān abhiyācami prāñjali-bhūtaḥ kṣetra-rajopama-kalpa sthihantu sarva-jagasya hitāya sukhāya |
analyzed: ye api ca nirvṛti darśitu kāmāḥ tān abhiyācami prāñjali bhūtaḥ kṣetra raja upama kalpa sthihantu sarva jagasya hitāya sukhāya

original: (6) XII vandana-pūjana-deśanatāya modan'-adhyeṣana-yācanatāya yac ca śubhaṁ mayi saṁcitu kiṁcid bodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam |
analyzed: vandana pūjana deśanatāya modana dhyeṣana yācanatāya yat ca śubha mayi sacitu kicid sarvam

original: (7) XIII pūjita bhontu atītaku buddhā ye ca dhriyanti daśad-diśi loke ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇa-manoratha bodhi-vibuddhā |
analyzed: bhontu buddhāḥ ye ca dhriyanti loke ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇa manoratha bodhi vibuddhāḥ

original: XIV yāvata keci daśad-diśi kṣetrās te pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ bodhi-drumendra-gatebhi jinebhir buddha-sutebhi ca bhontu prapūrṇāḥ |
analyzed: kṣetrāḥ te pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ bodhi druma indra gatebhiḥ jinebhiḥ buddha sutebhi ca bhontu prapūrṇāḥ

original: (8) XV yāvata keci daśad-diśi sattvās te sukhitāḥ sada bhontu arogāḥ sarva-jagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśā |
analyzed: sattvāḥ te sukhitāḥ bhontu arogāḥ sarvajagasya ca arthaḥ bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśā

original: XVI bodhi-cariṁ ca ahaṁ caramāṇo bhavi jāti-smaru sarva-gatīṣu sarvasu janmasu cyuty-upapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā |
analyzed: ca aha caramāṇaḥ sarvagatīṣu sarvasu janmasu cyuti upapattī

original: (9) XVII sarva-jinān' anuśikṣayamāṇo bhadra-cariṁ paripūrayamāṇaḥ śila-cariṁ vimalāṁ pariśuddhāṁ nityam akhaṇḍam acchidra careyam |
analyzed: sarva jinān anuśikṣayamāṇaḥ bhadra cari paripūrayamāṇaḥ śila cari vimalā pariśuddhā nityam akhaṇḍam acchidra careyam

original: XVIII deva-rutebhi ca nāga-rutebhir yakṣa-kumbhāṇḍa-manuṣya-rutebhiḥ yāni ca sarva-rutāni jagasya sarva-ruteṣv ahu deśayi dharmam |
analyzed: ca nāga rutebhiḥ yakṣa kumbhāṇḍa manuṣya rutebhiḥ yāni ca sarva rutāni jagasya sarva ruteṣu deśayi dharmam

original: (10) XIX peśalu pāramitāsv abhiyukto bodhiyi cittu ma jātu vimuhyet ye'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇīyās teṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam |
analyzed: peśalu pāramitāsu abhiyuktaḥ cittu ma jātu vimuhyet ye api ca pāpake āvaraṇīyāḥ teṣu

original: XX karmatu kleśatu māra-pathāto loka-gatīṣu vimuktu careyam padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūrya śaśī gagane'va asaktaḥ |
analyzed: kleśatu māra pathātaḥ careyam padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūrya śaśī gagana iva asaktaḥ

original: (11) XXI sarvi apāya-dukhāṁ praśamanto sarva-jagat sthāpayamānaḥ sarva-jagasya hitāya careyaṁ yāvata kṣetra-pathā diśa tāsu |
analyzed: sarva sarva jagant sthāpayamānaḥ sarva jagasya hitāya careya

original: XXII sattva-cariṁ anuvartayamāno bodhi-cariṁ paripūrayamāṇaḥ bhadra-cariṁ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgata-kalpa careyam |
analyzed: sattva cari anuvartayamānaḥ bodhi cari paripūrayamāṇaḥ bhadra cari ca prabhāvayamānaḥ careyam

original: (12) XXIII ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā kāyatu vācatu cetanato vā eka-cari-praṇidhāna careyam |
analyzed: ye ca sabhā gata mama tebhiḥ samāgamu nityu careyyā

original: XXIV ye'pi ca mitrā mama hita-kāmā bhadra-carīya nidarśayitāraḥ tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṁś ca ahaṁ na virāgayi jātu |
analyzed: ye api ca mitrāḥ mama hita kāmāḥ nidarśayitāraḥ tebhiḥ tāḥ ca aha na jātu

original: (13) XXV dhārayamāṇu jināna sad-dharmaṁ bodhi-cariṁ paridīpayamānaḥ bhadra-cariṁ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgata-kalpa careyam |
analyzed: dhārayamāṇu saddharma bodhi cari paridīpayamānaḥ bhadra cari ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgata kalpa careyam

original: XXVI saṁmukha nityam ahaṁ jina paśye buddha-sutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān teṣu ca pūja kareya udārāṁ sarvi anāgata-kalpa-m-akhinnāḥ |
analyzed: nityam aha jina paśye buddha sutebhi nāthān teṣu ca pūja kareya udārā

original: (14) XXVII sarva-bhaveṣu ca saṁsaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣaya-prāptaḥ prajña-upāya-samādhi-vimokṣaiḥ sarva-guṇair bhavi akṣaya-kośaḥ |
analyzed: sarva bhaveṣu ca a saramāṇaḥ a kṣaya prāptaḥ prajñā upāya samādhi vimokṣaiḥ sarva guṇaiḥ a kṣaya kośaḥ

original: XXVIII eka-rajāgri rajopama-kṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiya buddhān buddha-sutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhi-cariṁ caramāṇaḥ |
analyzed: eka raja agri raja upama kṣetrā tatra ca madhye caramāṇaḥ

original: (15) XXIX evam aśeṣata sarva-diśāsu vāla-patheṣu triyadhva-pramāṇān buddha-samudr' atha kṣetra-samudrān otari cārika-kalpa samudrān |
analyzed: evam sarva diśāsu vālapatheṣu tri yadhva pramāṇān buddha samudra atha kṣetra samudrān otari samudrān

analyzed: eka svara aṅga samudra rutebhiḥ svara aṅga viśuddhim sarva jagasya yathā āśaya ghoṣān buddha sarasvatim otari nityam

original: (16) XXXI teṣu ca akṣaya-ghoṣa-ruteṣu sarva-triyadhva-gatāna jinānām cakra-nayaṁ parivartayamāno buddhi-balena ahaṁ praviśeyam |
analyzed: teṣu ca akṣaya ghoṣa ruteṣu jinānām cakra naya parivartayamānaḥ buddhi balena aha praviśeyam

original: XXXII eka-kṣaṇena anāgata sarvān kalpa-praveśa ahaṁ praviśeyam ye'pi ca kalpa triyadhva-pramāṇās tān kṣaṇa-koṭi-praviṣṭa careyam |
analyzed: eka kṣaṇena anāgata sarvān kalpa praveśa aha praviśeyam ye api ca kalpa tri yadhva pramāṇāḥ tān careyam

original: (17) XXXIII ye ce triyadhva-gatā nara-siṁhāṁs tān ahu paśyiya eka-kṣaṇena teṣu ca gocarim otari nityaṁ māya-gatena vimokṣa-balena |
analyzed: ye ce triyadhva gatāḥ nara sihāḥ tān eka kṣaṇena teṣu ca māyā gatena vimokṣa balena

analyzed: ye ca kṣetra viyūhāḥ tān eka raja agre evam sarva diśāsu otari kṣetra viyūha jinānām

original: (18) XXXV ye ca anāgata loka-pradīpās teṣu vibudhyana cakra-pravṛttim nirvṛti-darśana niṣṭha-praśāntiṁ sarvi ahaṁ upasaṁkrami nāthān |

analyzed: karma bala pariśodhayamānaḥ kleśa bala parimardayamānaḥ māra bala abala karamāṇaḥ sarvān

original: (20) XXXIX kṣetra-samudra viśodhayamānaḥ sattva-samudra vimocayamānaḥ dharma-samudra vipaśyayamāno jñāna-samudra vigāhayamānaḥ |
analyzed: kṣetra samudra viśodhayamānaḥ sattva samudra vimocayamānaḥ dharma samudra vipaśyayamānaḥ jñāna samudra vigāhayamānaḥ

original: XL carya-samudra viśodhayamānaḥ praṇidhi-samudra prapūrayamāṇaḥ buddha-samudra prapūjayamānaḥ kalpa-samudra careyam akhinnaḥ |
analyzed: carya samudra viśodhay praṇidhi samudra prapūray buddha samudra prapūjay kalpa samudra car akhinna

analyzed: ye ca bodhi cari praṇidhāna viśeṣāḥ tān pūraya aśeṣān bodhim

original: XLII jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarva-jinānāṁ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ tasya vidusya sabhāga-carīye nāmayamī kuśalaṁ imu sarvam |
analyzed: yaḥ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ tasya sabhāgacarīye sarvam

analyzed: viśuddhiḥ atha kṣetra viśuddhiḥ mama tena

original: XLIV bhadra-carīya samanta-śubhāye mañjuśirī-praṇidhāna careyam sarvi anāgata-kalpa-m -akhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṁ kriya sarvi aśeṣām |
analyzed: careyam sarvi anāgata kalpam akhinnaḥ

analyzed: yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya sattva aśeṣatas niṣṭha tathā eva karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvata niṣṭha mama praṇidhānam

original: (24) XLVII ye ca daśad-diśi kṣetra anantā ratna-alaṁkṛtu dadyu jinānām divya ca mānuṣa saukhya viśiṣṭāṁ kṣetra-rajopama-kalpa dadeyam |
analyzed: ye ca daśaddiśi kṣetra anantā ratnaalakṛtu dadyu jinānām divya ca mānuṣa saukhya viśiṣṭā kṣetra raja upama kalpa dadeyam

original: XLVIII yaś ca imaṁ pariṇāmana-rājaṁ śrutva sakṛj janayed adhimuktim bodhi-varām anuprārthayamāno agru viśiṣṭa bhaved imu puṇyam |
analyzed: yaḥ ca ima sakṛt janayet adhimuktim bodhi varām anuprārthayamānaḥ bhavet puṇyam

original: (25) XLIX varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ kṣipru sa paśyati taṁ amitābhaṁ yasy imu bhadra-cari-praṇidhānam |
analyzed: varjita tena bhavanti apāyāḥ varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ kṣipru sa paśyati te amita ābha yasi bhadra cari praṇidhānam

original: L lābha sulabdha sujīvitu teṣāṁ sv-āgata te imu mānuṣa janma yādṛśa so hi samantatabhadras te'pi tathā na-cireṇa bhavanti |
analyzed: teṣām svāgata te mānuṣa janma te hi tathā nacireṇa bhavanti

analyzed: tīrthika māra gaṇebhiḥ adhṛṣyaḥ sa sarva tri loke

original: LIII kṣipru sa gacchati bodhi-drumendra gatva niṣīdati sattva-hitāya budhyati bodhi pravartayi cakra dharṣayi māru sa-sainyaku sarvam |
analyzed: sa gacchati bodhi druma indra gatva niṣīdati sattva hitāya budhyati bodhi sarvam

analyzed: bhadra cari praṇidhāna dhārayi vācayi deśayitaḥ vā buddha vijānati vipākaḥ bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha

original: LVI sarva-triyadhva-gatebhi jinebhir yā pariṇāmana varṇita agrā tāya ahaṁ kuśalaṁ imu sarvaṁ nāmayamī vara-bhadra-carīye |

analyzed: ca aha karamāṇaḥ āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān samukha vrajeyam

original: (29) LVIII tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrāḥ tāṁś ca ahaṁ paripūrya aśeṣān sattva-hitaṁ kari yāvata loke |
analyzed: tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi samagrāḥ tāḥ ca aha paripūrya aśeṣān sattva hita loke

original: LIX tahi jina-maṇḍali śobhani ramye padma-vare rucire upapannaḥ vyākaraṇaṁ ahu tatra labheyyā saṁmukhato amitābha-jinasya |
analyzed: jina maṇḍali śobhani ramye padma vare rucire upapannaḥ tatra

original: LX vyākaraṇaṁ pratilabhya ca tasmin nirmita-koṭi-śatebhir anekaiḥ sattva-hitāni bahūny ahu kuryāṁ dikṣu daśasv api buddhi-balena |
analyzed: vyākaraṇa pratilabh ca tasmin nirmita koṭi śatebhiḥ aneka sattva hitāni bahūni kuryāḥ dikṣu daśasu api buddhi balena

original: (30) LXII bhadra-cariṁ pariṇāmya yad-āptaṁ puṇyam anantam atīva viśiṣṭam tena jagad vyasanaugha-nimagnaṁ yātv amitābha-puriṁ varam eva |
analyzed: bhadracari puṇyam anantam atīva viśiṣṭam tena jagant vyasana ogha nimagna yātu amitābha puri varam eva

original: LXI bhadra-cari-praṇidhāna paṭhitvā yat kuśalaṁ mayi saṁcitu kiṁcit eka-kṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṁ tena jagasya śubhaṁ praṇidhānam | (31)
analyzed: bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yat kuśala mayi sacitu kicid eka kṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarva tena jagasya śubha praṇidhānam
